title: CAZ Debuts Fund for Individuals to Back Private-Asset Firms
description: Alternative money manager CAZ Investments launched a fund for individuals that will take stakes in private-asset firms, a niche strategy that’s gathering momentum amid a secondaries boom.
content: Alternative money manager CAZ Investments launched a fund for individuals that will take stakes in private-asset firms, a niche strategy that’s gathering momentum amid a secondaries boom.
